name: Aardvark
overview: Aardvark is a fan-made port of the Commodore 16 game of the same name, developed by Rajcsányi László and additionally release for the 3DS. Control the Aardvark's tongue and clean the ant eggs up. Beware super ants and caterpillars which can reduce the egg counter. As the sun goes down, the game is over. The further you get in the game, the faster the day goes, but your mission is not impossible. The game has 14 levels and 5 maze combinations.
